PEAR Channel REST structure creator @author Jean-Lou Dupont @version $Id: build.channel.xml 257 2007-11-16 16:13:27Z JeanLou.Dupont $ -----------------------------------
This PHING build file assumes to be located in a directory one level down from the actual target location of the PEAR Channel. E.g. channel needs to be located in $root build files located in $root/.build/
This build file was tested on PHING v2.3.
INSTRUCTIONS: ============= 1) be sure to have the 'write' access rights to the directory structure. 2) answer 'y' to the next question if you wish to proceed. 3) enter the channel's properties when queried
Remember that you can always re-run this script if you made any mistake.
================================================================ >> The channel will be located in the following filesystem path: >> ${project.path} ================================================================

input.defaultvalue: Jean-Lou Dupont's PEAR-Amazon repository on GoogleCode

target.name: channel
target.echo: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" ?> <channel version="1.0" xmlns="http://pear.php.net/channel-1.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://pear.php.net/dtd/channel-1.0 http://pear.php.net/dtd/channel-1.0.xsd"> <!-- This file was generated by Jean-Lou Dupont's PHING task for PEAR Channel --> <name>${channel.name}</name> <summary>${channel.summary}</summary> <suggestedalias>${channel.alias}</suggestedalias> <servers> <primary> <rest> <baseurl type="REST1.0">${channel.uri}/rest/</baseurl> <baseurl type="REST1.1">${channel.uri}/rest/</baseurl> </rest> </primary> </servers> </channel>
